name: Bobble
description:
This is a small arcade game. Two players.

Controls:

  • Z to jump (Z+Down to jump down)
  • X to attack

You have to collect all the ruby to jump to the next level.

In case your friend dies, you can try to kill all the enemies of the level and a cross will appear at the center of the screen, allowing the ghost to come back to life.

The game has simple but cool physics based on bubble explosions.

There is not a lot of content in the game, but you can add some levels easily.

The source code is available on Github.

Background music is from Labbed.
